playn.core.gl

Class GLShader.Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.gl.GLShader.Core
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedTrisShader.ITCore, QuadShader.QuadCore
    Enclosing class:
    GLShader

    protected abstract class GLShader.Core
extends Object
    Implements the core of the indexed tris shader.

      See GLShader.addTriangles(playn.core.InternalTransform, float[], float, float, int[]).

      Destroys this core's shader program and any other GL resources it maintains.

      Flushes this core's queued geometry to the GPU.
